data.text: @SteveBellone The CDC is now recommending no masks in schools in our county.  The time has come (and is overdue) for you to stand up to Governor Hochul and protect our children from her mandate.

@SteveBellone Who is responsible for posting the daily Suffolk COVID numbers because on more then one occasion the numbers are a mess, like tonight. This is a representation of your office and you should expect better!
@SteveBellone All the stages are done! We are at the "End Game" stage & been there for a while. Stop catering to the higher-up Dem's like Hochul with her #fearporn
@SteveBellone Youâ€™re Not fighting for our children at all!!!!!
